Description: Clay tablet; formerly complete; gift of real estate with maintenance agreement; Old Babylonian; loose fragments broken from object; partially repaired.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.220)
Condition: Incomplete; formerly complete; loose fragments broken from object; partially repaired.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
